To all People to Whom these Presents shall come Greeting know
ye that we the under signed for the sum of three Thousand Dollars to
us in hand paid by Jeremiah Halsey Esqr of Preston in the Country of
New London and State of Connecticut received to our full satisfaction
do therefore hereby convey and assign over the within written leafe
to him the said Jeremiah Halsey Esqr and to his heirs and assigns
forever together with all our might Title Interest and and Estates
Which we have in and by virtue of the within Written Leafe
In Testimony whereof we have hereunto set our hand
and seals the Third day of may one thousand seven hunderd
and Ninetyseve?
